website_summaries.verdict: The affordable Samsung Galaxy Stratosphere II is perfectly fine and will likely please keyboard lovers on Verizon, but it could have been a slam dunk.

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Phone was a gift to my son. He had a Stratosphere phone before, but was worried about ordering a phone from the internet. He seems to like it a lot! He is impressed with the service and quality - so far.
customer_reviews.author: lauri3

customer_reviews.title: Like New
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but much less costly than buying full price through carrier. As far as the phone, it's still one of my top 3 favorite phones that I've ever owned. And yes, I WANT the keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: T Frese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement phone for my old one...switching over the SIM and memory card was simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: billybaloneey

customer_reviews.title: smartphone
customer_reviews.text: great phone, love it, bought it for my wife, new to smartphones, she's extremely happy with the phone and the ease to navigate thru it. Again, Amazon to the rescue, great pricing for this phone compare to the retailers prices.
customer_reviews.author: JOE V.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my mom's droid 4
customer_reviews.text: My mom dropped her droid 4 in the pool. She got this and she really enjoys it. It has a few more features than the droid 4, and we'll all be moving to a nexus on ATT next year.Five stars would be if google supported the OS beyond ship date.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone for a replacement after mine was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for a replacement after mine was stolen. I have had absolutely no problems with it. Well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bean

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Stratosphere II phone I have purchased - one as a gift. I love this phone and the free apps that make it special.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M. Blacet

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed to migrate to a smart phone, but all the phones I had tried before had virtual keyboards that I found hard to use, or boasted more features than I really needed. This phone allows me to sync my calendars, manage my contacts, and use it as a mobile hot spot. The screen is clear; I've got 4G speed; and it's even a pretty good phone.
customer_reviews.author: barbiesue

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NOT a good buy. The microphone does not work unless on speaker.....this was a disaster of a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The box wasn't new looking, but the phone & all the attachments were fresh & in factory new wrapped condition. The phone works perfectly & was better than "advertised".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice slick design and user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Droid 4 ti this phone recently and I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Cinycyde

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone is number code locked so have to get it reset somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Yes it met my expectations and fits easily in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holtman

customer_reviews.title: Don't order from Forever Deals
customer_reviews.text: I tried purchasing this phone from Forever Deals and I've had a non-satisfactory experience thus far. The first phone received the microphone didn't work, I then had a fairly lengthy return time, and the second phone I received none of the speakers worked. So essentially I received two phones neither functioned and had a lengthy return process. Also the second one I received had the previous owners media messages still on it, it was obviously not reset or refurbished in any manner. The phone itself seems to be a great phone, if you're looking for a keyboard, and don't mind having an older version of android. However I would recommend ordering from a different vendor then Forever Deals.
customer_reviews.author: GDBRYAN

customer_reviews.title: Shipped promptly and in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am thrilled with this cell phone. It is exactly what I wanted and appears to have all the functions I wanted. It did not come with a SIM card or an SD card - even though it was supposed to include the SIM. I just moved a SIM card from a previous phone and it worked fine. I did have to activate the phone through Verizon's website since I was transferring a SIM card.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Moss

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard phone around
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these over the last couple of years. This is the best keyboard phone still available - noticeably better than the original Stratosphere. Good quality overall, but the battery usage for voice calls is high. It can be hard to make it through a whole day without recharging if you talk for more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: no longer able to activate on Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Despite this being a 4G phone, you can not activate it on Verizon. Frustrated that the seller would not realize this and no longer offer the phone.
customer_reviews.author: TL Groshek

customer_reviews.title: Bad function key
customer_reviews.text: I started out really enjoying this phone until after only a month the 'function' key on the Qwerty keyboard stopped working. I'm± sure what to do about it, if anything be done. very disappointed now because I really enjoyed having a physical keyboard again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not so bad
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone since Page Plus finally allows 4G phones & my Droid X was becoming unusable and beyond slow. I really would have preferred a Galaxy S3 or a Mini, but they cost a lot more in like new condition, so this will do for now. Just wish it had a 8 megapixel camera instead of 5 megapixels. But it is great to have a newer version of Android and fast so far.
customer_reviews.author: lee sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but kinda small keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great phone.. Keyboard buttons a little small but good format setup.. Not great for gaming and less than a gig of ram but plays most games fine and the camera IMO is really good for a phone
customer_reviews.author: Phil Nicola III

customer_reviews.title: Ok phone but may be out of date
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, out of box like new. Quality of the sound was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stratosphere Review
customer_reviews.text: Great phone especially for the money. Worth buying last years model with all of the features of a phone today. 4G, Google Now, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jdg

customer_reviews.title: The last of the global ready sliders
customer_reviews.text: All I could ask for in a CDMA slider with a SIM.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern Snowboarder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just as described and got here quicker than expected. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: spiritwolftmj

customer_reviews.title: finally! a statosphere that works
customer_reviews.text: Had the first version.worst phone ever. this phone is good.only thing so far is the space bar on the keypad. I notice after typing a sentence that most words have no space.
customer_reviews.author: Mazinmets9

customer_reviews.title: worst phone ive ever bought
customer_reviews.text: The sweet sliding screen broke twice in the same way...all in 6 months. Battery life is short must be charged minimum every night. Randomly shuts off an glitches. Majorly regretting the cash i dumped into this phone.
customer_reviews.author: tooschoolforcool

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy having the keyboard because I never did get the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this phone for almost two years now. It's getting a bit dated, but it doesn't have a whole lot of problems otherwise - I don't have to reset it frequently and such. I enjoy having the keyboard because I never did get the hang of Swype. Perhaps the only huge drawback to me is that the keyboard makes it quite thick... but then again, the thickness is worth it to me if it means I get a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Avalikia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Phone
customer_reviews.text: A terrible phone and not worth the physical keyboard. I switched to it from another phone with a keyboard and it's noticably slower and glitchier than its counterparts. It's like having a brick phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Maltby

customer_reviews.title: Fatal Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This won't matter to most of you. But this phone has a major security flaw..as most other devices have, also. In the ongoing NOTIFICATION selection, it contually displays a WI FI OFF notice. If you touvh that NOTICE in an attempt to delete it, it turns ON your WI FI. And if you have crooks or malicios hackers in your vicinity as I had, they will "clone" your phone and do anything they want with your phone. Look up "phone cloning" on "Google".
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: can't find skins for this phone
customer_reviews.text: We just bought these phones yesterday and cannot find skins (decal type, not the hard or rubber cases) for them. I can find skins for the I-405 model but not the I-415 model. Anyone out there know where I can find them? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Seance

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Stratosphere II, Black 8GB (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description:
The Samsung Galaxy Stratosphere II SCH-I415 is a lighter, sleeker update of the original, and comes equipped with NFC technology. This Android device features 4G LTE high-speed data, a slide-out full QWERTY keyboard, 4-inch OLED display, 5-megapixel camera with video recording, front-facing camera, and DLNA media streaming. The Stratosphere II is also equipped with WiFi, 8GB internal storage, microSD slot for additional storage, and quadband GSM along with WCDMA modes for international use. Use this device to access thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on Google's Play Store. 





AMAZON.COM




4.0-Inch Super AMOLED Screen, 800x480 
(view larger). 

5-MP rear-facing camera with LED Flash (view larger). SAMSUNG GALAXY STRATOSPHERE II
AT A GLANCE:

 * 4G LTE connectivity
   
   
 * Android v4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
   
   
 * 1.2 GHz dual-core processor
   
   
 * 4-inch super AMOLED screen
   
   
 * Dual cameras - 5-megapixel rear-facing with LED flash, 1.3-megapixel front-facing
   
   
 * Eight GB ROM (actual formatted memory is less)
   
   
 * NFC technology
   
   
 * 1800 mAh battery
   
   

TOUCH AND TYPE TAKE FLIGHT
Samsung Galaxy Stratosphere II features a versatile form factor that allows you to connect with friends and interact with your world in brand-new ways. The slide-out QWERTY keyboard is the perfect tool to help you get your message out fast. And the ample 4.0-inch Super AMOLED display has plenty of room for you to enjoy chats, status updates, web browsing, photos, videos and more.

ACCESS YOUR WORLD FAST
Powered by Verizon’s 4G LTE network means you’ll get up to speed in an instant with fast downloads, smooth streaming and quick connections on the go. Galaxy Stratosphere II is also Global Ready, which gives you the chance to conduct business, check your calendars, review reports and keep in constant contact, no matter where in the world your travels take you.

SMARTER SHARING AND INTERACTING
Intuitive apps and advanced functions take device interactions and content sharing to a new level. S Beam instantly shares everything from pictures to large video files with just a touch. With S Voice, you can simply say what you need to find what you’re looking for. 

FAST MESSAGING
Get your message out fast with the slide-out QWERTY keyboard and more intuitive features like dedicated shortcut keys to make texting and communicating quick and easy.

INSTINCT TAKES OVER
The intuitive Android 4.0, Ice Cream Sandwich platform on Galaxy Stratosphere II lets you customize your smartphone experience so you can easily interact with your device as never before. From accessing Google services to customizing home screens and adding apps and widgets, every action seems effortless on Samsung Galaxy Stratosphere II. 

SAFE AND SECURE
Galaxy Stratosphere II, a SAFE (Samsung Approved For Enterprise) device, features a new level of enterprise-grade functionality to meet your secure business needs. Enhanced security features include on-device AES 256-bit encryption, VPN (Virtual Private Network) connectivity and secure mobile device management, which gives your IT administrator the ability to easily monitor, update and troubleshoot your device. You can also securely sync your contacts, meeting reminders, calendar notifications and business emails when you’re on the road.

S-BEAM
Share multimedia files like photos and videos between two S Beam enabled devices simply by touching the backs together to “beam” contentfrom one device to the other. It’s sharing made easy. Share anything from photos to maps with directions.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung Galaxy Stratosphere II, wall/USB charger, product safety and warranty brochure, quick reference guide

VITAL STATISTICS
The Galaxy Stratosphere measures 4.97 x 2.58 x .53 inches and weighs 5.43 ounces. 






VERIZON WIRELESS 4G LTE NETWORK
The Verizon Wireless 4G LTE network allows you to download photos, apps, and games in seconds and entire movies in minutes. LTE (or Long Term Evolution provides significantly increased upload and download speeds over 3G networks, as well as significantly reduced latency (or lag time). Verizon Wireless expects 4G LTE average data rates to be 5-12 megabits per second (Mbps) on the downlink and 2-5 Mbps on the uplink in real-world, loaded network environments.

With these blazing fast speeds, you'll be able to stream HD movies without the annoyance of constant pauses to buffer the video stream--as well as quickly download HD-quality movies right to your phone in minutes. Additionally, you'll be able to download a new song file in about 4 seconds or upload a photo to your favorite social networking site in about 6 seconds.

The Verizon Wireless 4G LTE mobile broadband network will also redefine the mobile office for business users. Business applications that used to require wired networks will be untethered forever, allowing you maximized productivity and efficiency while you're out of the confines of your office. Enhanced security lets you tap into most VPN networks with less waiting, and faster responsiveness enables you to upload 10 MB presentations back to your team in less than 25 seconds.

In areas serviced only by 3G, you can expect download speeds of 600 Kbps to 1.4 Mbps and upload speeds of 500 to 800 Kbps in Mobile Broadband coverage area.






ANDROID ICE CREAM SANDWICH OPERATING SYSTEM
This phone runs the Android 4.0.4 operating system (dubbed Ice Cream Sandwich), which adds powerful new ways of communicating and sharing while improving on the best Android features: easy multitasking, rich notifications, customizable home screens, resizable widgets, and more.

The updated Ice Cream Sandwich interface features an onscreen navigation bar that replaces the hardware buttons for Back, Home, and Menu found with older Android-powered phones. And with Google+ integration, you can video chat with groups of up to 9 friends as well as easily upload and share photos and videos. Other features include:

Face Unlock
You can now unlock your phone with just your face using the Face Unlock option. It takes advantage of the front-facing camera and state-of-the-art facial recognition technology to register a face during setup and then to recognize it again when unlocking the device. Just hold your phone in front of your face to unlock (or use a backup PIN).

And the lock screen now lets you do more without unlocking. From the slide lock screen, you can jump directly to the camera for a picture or pull down the notifications window to check for messages. When listening to music, you can even manage music tracks and see album art.

Home Screen Folders
Quickly access related apps right from the home screen by organizing apps and shortcuts into folders--just drag one app onto another to create a folder.

Multitasking
Multitasking is even easier and more visual in Android 4.0.4. The Recent Apps button lets you jump instantly from one task to another using the list in the System Bar. The list pops up to show thumbnail images of apps used recently--tapping a thumbnail switches to the app.

Voice Input
The new voice engine in Android 4.0.4 lets you dictate the text you want, for as long as you want, using the language you want. You can speak continuously for a prolonged time, even pausing for intervals if needed, and dictate punctuation to create correct sentences. As the voice input engine enters text, it underlines possible dictation errors in gray. After dictating, you can tap the underlined words to quickly replace them from a list of suggestions.

ANDROID 4.0.4 FEATURES
 * Global roaming in 220 countries
 * Direct access from the lock screen to phone, camera, and text
 * New home screen layout with enhanced launch bar
 * Improved voice input: hold down the search key to dictate emails and text or navigate to an address
 * Face unlock: the device uses the front-facing camera to automatically recognize you when you attempt to unlock
 * Data usage: the new usage center allows you to monitor how much data is consumed each month
 * Android Market for browsing and downloading thousands of free and paid apps 
 * Pre-loaded Android apps: Browser, Calculator, Calendar (Google or Corporate), Camera, Clock, Contacts, Email, Gallery, Messaging, Music, News & Weather, Phone, Settings, Video Player, Voice Dialer, Voice Search, YouTube 
 * Google applications: Gmail, Google Search, Google Voice Search, Google Latitude, Google Maps, Google Places, Google Talk 
 * Google Maps Navigation with spoken turn-by-turn directions showing real-time traffic and 360° views of the destination 






CONNECTIVITY
 * Ultra-fast 4G LTE connectivity via Verizon's network
 * Wireless Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g/n) for accessing home and corporate networks 
 * Built-in mobile hotspot functionality allows up to 10 Wi-Fi enabled devices to share the 4G experience on the go with a laptop, camera, music player, game unit, video player, or any other Wi-Fi enabled device
 * Near Field Communication (NFC) for sharing contacts, web pages, directions, and more to compatible phones 
 * VZ Navigator 

HARDWARE
 * 1.2 GHz dual-core processor speeds up everything--from playing games to watching shows to opening files from work 
 *  4-inch Super AMOLED Screen, 800x480 

BATTERY
 * Capacity 1800 mAh
 * Usage time up to 15 hours
 * Standby time up to 144 hours

COMMUNICATIONS & INTERNET
 * Samsung Internet Browser
 * Text (SMS) and picture/video (MMS) messaging with threaded messaging feature
 * Access to popular instant messaging services 
 * Personal and work e-mail through MS Exchange, Gmail, Yahoo, AOL, Windows Live Hotmail, or POP3/IMAP

CAMERA
 * Rear-facing camera 5 megapixels with LED Flash
 * Front-facing camera 1.3 megapixels for video chats and self portraits 
 * Video capture 720p HD and HD video playback

MULTIMEDIA
 * Music player download music from a variety of places and enjoy your favorite tunes where ever you go
 * Supported music formats MP3, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, WMA, and WAV
 * Supported video formats H.263, H.264, MPEG4, DivX/XviD 
 * Media Hubaccess thousands of movies, to purchase or rent, and TV shows; movies are available the day after DVD release or network premier; content can be viewed while downloading; share purchased content with up to five devices

MEMORY
 * MicroSD card supports up to 32 GB 
 * ROM eight GB (actual formatted memory is less)






ALSO AVAILABLE FOR THIS ANDROID DEVICE
Amazon Appstore for Android
Get a great paid app for free every day.

Kindle
Buy a book once and read it everywhere with our free Kindle Reading App for Android.

Amazon MP3
Shop 15 million songs and stream your Cloud Drive music directly from your Android device.

IMDB
Find local movie showtimes and TV listings, watch trailers, and search the world's largest source of entertainment information.

Audible
Download audiobooks directly to your Android device, then listen wherever you go, get audiobook news, earn badges, and more.

Amazon Mobile
Shop for millions of products, get product details, and read reviews--right from your mobile device.
